patthana11.5:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana11.5:0.3_0: Standing on the spot, he depraved:
patthana11.5:1.1_0: (This should not give rise to thoughts about the unskillful.)
patthana11.5:2.1_0: There are twenty-four results of good deeds ...
patthana11.5:3.1_0: (This should not be expanded in brief.)
patthana11.5:4.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
patthana11.5:5.1_0: (This should not be expanded in brief.)
